name: Impact Bias
description: This metric measures the impact bias of the vulnerability.

values.name: Normal
values.description: Confidentiality Impact, Integrity Impact, and Availability Impact are all assigned the same weight.

values.name: Confidentiality
values.description: Confidentiality impact is assigned greater weight than Integrity Impact or Availability Impact.

values.name: Integrity
values.description: Integrity Impact is assigned greater weight than Confidentiality Impact or Availability Impact.

values.name: Availability
values.description: Availability Impact is assigned greater weight than Confidentiality Impact or Integrity Impact.
